TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract Font implements class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Font

Docs.summary: Contains font attributes (font name, font size, color, and so on) for an object.

remarks.para: This is a COM class interface that is required for COM interoperability. This interface defines no members of its own. You use this interface to access the members of the class interface from which this interface inherits. For information about the inherited interface, including a link to the members it defines, see the following topic: .
Use the Font property to return the Font object.
You can use the New keyword to create a new, standalone Font object.
You can also duplicate a Font object by using the property.
